news_header: Cloudflare reported strong Q4 2024 earnings with a revenue increase of 27% year-over-year, driven by significant growth in large customers and improved sales productivity.
news_text: In the Q4 2024 earnings call, Cloudflare announced a revenue of $459.9 million, up 27% year-over-year, with a record addition of large customers. The company achieved a gross margin of 77.6% and an operating profit of $67.2 million. Cloudflare's strong performance was attributed to disciplined customer spending and a focus on delivering real ROI. The company is optimistic about 2025, anticipating continued growth driven by improvements in sales productivity and a robust pipeline of large contracts. Key themes included security, AI, and modernization, with a notable uptick in close rates and sales cycles.
